about_the_game:
OUR FIRST EVER DOUBLE FEATURE

Episodes 4 & 5: "Moving Out" is the result of a huge amount of work from our team. We realized how much content we had and decided to do the first ever double-episode for College Kings! Lose yourself in twice the amount of college hijinks and kinky antics at SVC!

NEW YEAR, NEW CHALLENGES

Welcome back to a new year in the vibrant world of San Vallejo College, where the aftermath of the fighting tournament brings with it unprecedented challenges. Both the Apes and Wolves face off against Mirken and the SVC administration.

In a surprising twist of events, players will find themselves moving into the Chicks frat house, will you play by the rules or cause some chaos? With Chris in the hospital and Grayson expelled, both fraternities are left leaderless. As tensions rise, you are at a crossroads: will you step up to lead, or let another head wear the crown?

LEADERSHIP AND LOYALTIES

"Moving Out" challenges who exactly you seek to be at SVC. Your decisions will not only shape your path but also impact the future of the fraternities. Will you be able to navigate these troubled waters and keep the spirit of the frats alive? Or perhaps you’ve thrown your lot in with Mirken and want to protect your secret.

As always, College Kings 2 delivers an immersive adult experience. With this episode having one of our largest collections of intense and sexy images and animations, explore complex relationships and fulfil your wildest fantasies as you journey through SVC. And with full Lovense integration, the sensations are more real than ever!

YOUR STORY, YOUR RULES

Episodes 4 & 5 offer hours of gameplay filled with meaningful choices and unpredictable outcomes. Each decision you make carries weight that affects everything that happens afterwards, making each playthrough uniquely yours. What legend will you write in the college history books?

College Kings 2 - Episodes 4 & 5 “Moving Out” requires the base game College Kings 2 and previous episodes on Steam.

content_descriptors.notes:
College Kings 2 contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old.
All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

name: College Kings 2 - Episodes 4 & 5 "Moving Out"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Continue the story of College Kings 2, a seductive and gripping choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. Decide how to combat a furious college administration. Will you unite the frats, run from the drama, or throw in with the enemy? The fate of SVC rests on your shoulders in Episodes 4 & 5 “Moving Out”.
